infovis.visualization
Interface ItemRenderer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractItemRenderer, StaticItemRenderer
public interface ItemRenderer

A ItemRenderer performs one or several stages of painting and picking for each item of a Visualization. It adheres to the Composite pattern. An item pipeline object performs one or several stage for painting a visualization item. Several pipeline objects are used to perform the whole rendering of one item. Each pipeline object is ranked so that it can be called in the right order by default. DefaultVisualization allows for an explicit reordering of these objects.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $
Author:
Jean-Daniel Fekete
